Text.#text: Relax in your spacious Guest room at the peaceful Holiday Inn Newcastle Upon Tyne hotel, close to the well-linked A1 and A19. Getting to the hotel is easy, with Newcastle Central rail station and Newcastle Airport both 6 miles away. You can leave your vehicle in our complimentary car park if you're driving, with the convenient A19 and A1 roads just minutes away. Holiday Inn Newcastle Upon Tyne occupies a rural setting surrounded by 16 acres of countryside, 6 miles from Newcastle city centre . Holiday Inn Newcastle Upon Tyne has 11 meeting rooms for up to 400 guests. You can keep in touch with wireless Internet throughout the hotel. Choose one of our Family rooms and take the kids to the ramparts and turrets of the medieval Alnwick Castle , featured in the Harry Potter movies. Our friendly staff will direct you to the brooding beauty of the nearby Northumberland coastline .
